title: Guadalcanal Diary
writer: Richard Tregaskis (by), Lamar Trotti (screenplay), Jerome Cady (adaptation), Richard Tregaskis (from the book by)
actors: Preston Foster, Lloyd Nolan, William Bendix, Richard Conte
plot: Concentrating on the personal lives of those involved, a war correspondent takes us through the preparations, landing and initial campaign on Guadalcanal during WWII.
name: Guadalcanal Diary
